items.preLabel: Provide an update on progress towards achievement of the MERI plans outcomes for the stage.
Has the project been delivered in accordance with the MERI Plan?
If not, describe why the project has not been delivered in accordance with the MERI Plan and provide detail on adaptations to the Plan.
Does the MERI plan require revision based on lessons learned in this stage?
If yes, please describe any changes that need to be made to the Plan.
Have you had any notifiable Workplace Health and Safety incidents during the reporting period?
